bio:
Martin is the 'Head of Development' and co-founder of Ubilabs. With expertise in interactive maps, location intelligence, and data analytics, Ubilabs provides custom web applications and consulting services for Google Maps and Google Cloud globally.

He is a recognized 'Google Developer Expert' for the Google Maps Platform and a renowned public speaker, known for his innovative projects like the spinning globe code in 1024 bytes of JavaScript, JSFuck, and programs written in Asian characters.
title: Head of Development
name: Martin Kleppe
shortBio: Martin is the 'Head of Development' and co-founder of Ubilabs.
